articles.description: Giovanni van Bronckhorst's Rangers qualified for the group stage of the competition for the first time since 2010 with a euphoric victory over PSV Eindhoven on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Liverpool and Rangers will clash in an historic Battle of Britain after being drawn in the same Champions League group on Thursday night.
Giovanni van Bronckhorst's Rangers qualified for the group s… [+3806 chars]
